name: Shape VS Shapes
description:
Shape VS Shapes is a fast-paced arcade game. Blast your way through 50+timed levels or go for a high score in Endless Mode!

The goal of Shape VS Shapes is to survive an onslaught of attackers while you defend yourself. Collect points and get massive combos, find the special Heart power-ups, and finish as quick as you can to win.

Features:

- 50+ levels
- Multiple themes
- Exponential combo multipliers
- Mouse/Trackpad controls
